thread.title: Save up to £50 per person on an escorted tour of Croatia - 10 nights all-inclusive from £719
thread.title_full: Save up to £50 per person on an escorted tour of Croatia - 10 nights all-inclusive from £719 - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Save up to £50 per person on an escorted tour of Croatia - 10 nights all-inclusive from £719
text: Discover the beautiful scenery, centuries of history and mix of cultures of the stunning Dalmatian Coast on a new 10-night all-inclusive escorted tour from just £719. Relax in picturesque Split at the locally rated 5-star Hotel President for three nights and enjoy an included guided tour of the city, before crossing the Adriatic Sea to the island of Brac. Spend seven nights at the locally rated 3-star Svpetrvs Kaktus Resort, where there will be plenty of time to unwind and make the most of the excellent climate, as well as explore the island and the village of Bol on a choice of included excursions. If you want to spend a little longer in this region after your tour, you can extend your holiday with a seven-night all-inclusive stay on the Makarska Riviera. - Offer available on all dates Apr-Oct, 2016 - Customers must book by July 18, 2015 - Call FREE on 0800 092 3081 or visit saga.co.uk/croatia-tour How to Claim: See the newspaper on Saturday, July 11, 2015 Follow @telegraph
